title: What were the key Roland Garros qualifying results?
description: Monday was the first day of Roland Garros qualifying, with players trying to earn their way into the main draw of the clay-court major. Former No. 9 in the PIF ATP Rankings Fabio Fognini will not extend his streak of consecutive Roland Garros main draw appearances to 17 after falling in the first round of qualifying. American Nicolas Moreno De Alboran ousted the Italian 6-3, 6-2.  View key Monday qualifying results from Paris below or click here to catch up on scores from all of the day's matches. You can also see Tuesday's order of play, which includes top seed Borna Coric. Key Results - Monday, QR1 (2) Alexander Shevchenko def. Shintaro Mochizuki 6-7(2), 6-2, 6-4 Nicolas Moreno De Alboran def. (7) Fabio Fognini 6-3, 6-2 Andrea Collarini def. (3) Nishesh Basavareddy 7-5, 5-7, 6-4 Bernard Tomic def. Coleman Wong 7-6(2), 6-3 Martin Landaluce def. Murkel Dellien 6-4, 3-6, 7-6(10-8) [NEWSLETTER FORM]

html:
View key results from Monday's action in Paris

May 19, 2025

AFP/Getty Images

Roland Garros is the second Grand Slam tournament of the season. By ATP Staff

Monday was the first day of Roland Garros qualifying, with players trying to earn their way into the main draw of the clay-court major.

Former No. 9 in the PIF ATP Rankings Fabio Fognini will not extend his streak of consecutive Roland Garros main draw appearances to 17 after falling in the first round of qualifying. American Nicolas Moreno De Alboran ousted the Italian 6-3, 6-2. 

View key Monday qualifying results from Paris below or click here to catch up on scores from all of the day's matches. You can also see Tuesday's order of play, which includes top seed Borna Coric.

Key Results - Monday, QR1
(2) Alexander Shevchenko def. Shintaro Mochizuki 6-7(2), 6-2, 6-4

Nicolas Moreno De Alboran def. (7) Fabio Fognini 6-3, 6-2

Andrea Collarini def. (3) Nishesh Basavareddy 7-5, 5-7, 6-4

Bernard Tomic def. Coleman Wong 7-6(2), 6-3

Martin Landaluce def. Murkel Dellien 6-4, 3-6, 7-6(10-8)
